title: Motorists facing delays on A31
text:
Heavy traffic causing delays for motorists travelling on the A31 in Hampshire this morning Motorists facing delays on A31 
MOTORISTS on the A31 are facing long delays this morning due to heavy traffic. Share article 
Traffic on the westbound carriageway between the M27 and A338 is very slow, leading to delays of at least 20 minutes. 
Normal traffic conditions are expected to resume from 10.30am. Promoted Stories Heavy traffic causing delays for motorists travelling on the A31 in Hampshire this morning Sorry, an error occurred.
